alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper; Tidal Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 09 at 7:50PM EST until January 10 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * WHERE...In Georgia, Coastal Chatham County. In South Carolina, Beaufort, Coastal Colleton, Charleston, Coastal Jasper and Tidal Berkeley Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Numerous trees and powerlines remain down in the wake of earlier high winds. Be alert for these overnight. Never drive over or approach downed powerlines.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper; Tidal Berkeley
